entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
